checks.name: certificate_transparency_logging_enabled
checks.title: Ensure ACM certificate transparency is enabled to enhance website security and detect unauthorized SSL/TLS certificates.
checks.risk: Without ACM certificate transparency, the risk of unauthorized SSL/TLS certificates going undetected increases, posing a threat to website and infrastructure security.

remediation.text: To fix this issue, select the certificate you want to check in ACM. In the certificate details, look for the 'Certificate Transparency Logging' attribute and ensure it is enabled.
